thread.title: Cheviot Financial Corp. Announces Dividend

title: Cheviot Financial Corp. Announces Dividend
text: Cheviot Financial Corp. Announces Dividend August 19, 2015 10:18 ET | Source: Cheviot Financial Corp. CHEVIOT, Ohio, Aug. 19,   Cheviot Financial Corp. (NASDAQ: CHEV ), holding company of Cheviot Savings Bank, has declared its dividend for the 3rd Quarter of 2015. The Company will pay a dividend of $0.10 per share to stockholders of record September 15, 2015. The dividend will be paid September 30, 2015. Cheviot Financial Corp. is traded on the NASDAQ under the symbol CHEV. Contact â€“ Cheviot Savings Bank Mark T. Reitzes 513-661-0457 Related Articles
